author: PTI
title: MHA asks states to stop mass exodus of labourers
description: MHA asks states to stop mass exodus of labourersIn an advisory to all states and Union territories, the home ministry said they should also make arrangements for uninterrupted supply of essential commodities to hotels, working women hostels so that they conti…
content: NEW DELHI: The Union Home Ministry on Friday asked state governments to prevent a mass exodus of migrant agriculture labourers, industrial workers and unorganised sector employees from their workplaces to hometowns amid a 21-day nationwide lockdown to combat … [+1233 chars]
